intro:
A child's mind is innocent, yet troubling. Take control of 
a young girl, as she spends the week without her 
parents, in a place far away from home. Keep her calm. 
Keep her safe. Keep her in the light.
description:
Shut Eye on Nintendo Switch™ - now with refreshed 
graphics and gameplay!

Play as a young child, who is away from her parents. The 
girl has suffered from anxiety most of her life, which lead 
to confusion and an exuberant imagination. When the 
lights go out, and the moon comes out, it's when the story 
begins.

Keep her safe and awake. Things at the night may take an 
unexpected turn. These toys are out to play, and the 
question is - are they real or is this just the child's 
imagination?

Survive the night and keep your anxiety level down, as 
throughout the night you will experience the true meaning 
of what a child's imagination can be.

Each night you may encounter different types of creatures. 
Don't let their cuteness fool you! The higher your anxiety 
level goes, the harder things become.

Keep her calm. Keep her safe. Keep her in the light.
